four.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She is married with four children.
They arrived just after four  (=four o'clock).
Luke will soon be four  (=four years old).
four.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a hit in cricket that scores four runs because it goes over the edge of the playing area
four.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a team of four people who row a racing boat, or the boat that they row
